name: The Legend of Zelda: Eternal Rain
name_original: The Legend of Zelda: Eternal Rain
description:
A game made for the MFGG "Too Much Water" Jam. After the events of Majora's Mask, Link journeys into the outskirts of Hyrule. Link stumbles upon the Peahat Pub, and finds out the outskirts have been stuck in a rain storm for the past 2,000 days.

CONTROLS

Movement - Arrow Keys Sword/Interact - Z Bombs - A Bow - S
